title: Esker Cycles selling ownership shares thru StartEngine equity crowdfunding
content:
Ever wanted to own a piece of a bike company without actually having to start your own bike company? Esker Cycles, which was co-founded by industry veteran Tim Krueger and uses Dave Weagleâ€™s Orion suspension system for their full-susser mountain bikes, is now giving you the opportunity to own shares in their company.
